overview: Ignition is a truly unique shop in that all employees are skaters. And not just skaters, but damn good ones as well. Ignition is a definition of a special atmosphere: the one that is conveyed through the two first (and latest) DVDs from Ignition skateshop. Now this might seem like a lot of blah blah to please commercial interests to you, but it isn't.
title: Ignition Tour 2006
